summary: Alertas Climáticas (Climate Alerts) module fully tested. All backend API endpoints and frontend features working correctly. Backend: 31/31 tests passed. Frontend: 18/18 E2E tests passed. The module allows automatic alert generation based on weather conditions (high humidity, high temperature, rain, mild temperature) with manual data entry fallback and rule configuration.
seed_data_creation: No seed data created. Tests used existing alerts in the database (21+ alerts already present).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Alertas Climáticas module fully tested. Backend endpoints: GET /api/alertas-clima (list with filters), POST /api/alertas-clima/clima/manual (register manual data), POST /api/alertas-clima/verificar-todas (verify all parcelas), PUT /api/alertas-clima/{id} (update status), GET /api/alertas-clima/reglas/config (get rules), PUT /api/alertas-clima/reglas/{id} (toggle rules), GET /api/alertas-clima/stats (statistics). Frontend tested: navigation, stats display, filter buttons (pendiente/revisada/resuelta/todas), manual data form submission, config panel with rules, alert card expansion, status updates.

backend_endpoints: GET /api/alertas-clima - List alerts with filters (estado, prioridad)
POST /api/alertas-clima/verificar-todas - Verify climate in all parcelas
frontend_features: Manual data form opens and submits correctly
Configuration panel shows rules and allows toggling
Alert cards expand to show details
